Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #Kokiri Forest# is on the path to #Phantom Ganon#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that scoring 1500 in #horseback archery# grants #a Piece of Heart#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# is on the path to #Bongo Bongo#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #the Song of Time#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the path to #Barinade#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that slaying #20 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #a Piece of Heart#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that dodging #rolling boulders in the Water Temple# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.
